column5: That's one awesome fish  Congrats on the new PB
someone please don't let CCMT look at this thread again. I'm afraid he'll go blind soon.
deleted
holy!!!!! Beauty one man!
nice work.  way to go, guys!
WOW, that thing is a beast, congrats
Not much time to describe it, but what a feeling!!!  Got a decent fish to start    My buddy Cal got his first salmon ever    James got one, we're all tied up.    Then my P.B.
btw fish were caught on stoneflies
Dang!  Those were huge!  Congratulations on beaching those whales, musta been a battle fer sure.  WTG.
wow,wtg on the pb.
wow... those are some huge salmon...and your PB....now that's a king.
WOW!!!  Those are all great fish but your new PB....I promised my mother I wouldn't use that kind of language!  Congratulations!!!
holy snapen arsels , margart . That is one big salmon!!! those are some nice fish.  Bly I'm telling MOM on you!!!
Holy cow, those are some sweet fish.  Congrats!
Oh my freaking god!!!  That thing is huge!!! Congrats!!!
Holy s........t man those are huge.  MTP
what's the weight on the PB?
Spectacular!
That shot of you with the big one looks like something from the Skeena, LOL! Nice fish Steve!
Ok...I just looked at the pics again...and same thing...  OH MY FREAKIN GOD!!!!  Ok...I feel a bit better now....
WOW! Monster Salmon. Looks like it can swallow a soccer ball whole!
WTG man.....that's a huge fish.....probably pushing 40lbs.......congrats!!!  Jason
didnt weigh it to be honest, just got a pic and he started milting everywhere, so he went back, and actually swam away, i hope he gets to finish out his job!
For anyone that thinks its photoshopped, because ive had that complaint elsewhere, check this out .. and excuse my language foul at the end, i was pretty excited.
Daang!  Look at the kype on that sucker!!  Right on bra.  cheers HD
I know this is the thrid time I've commented, but I never doubted you on your catch...  And let me say OH MY FREAKIN GOD one more time....LOL.
That's gotta give you a sore back, but in a good way.  LOL.  WTG!
Really awesome fish Steve !!!!! Congrats on the new PB.  Always great to see someone set a new benchmark for themselves.  Good meeting you a couple weeks ago too, BTW.
WOW....Big salmon guys !!!!!   well done congrats steve on that PB....cheers
thanks for the report, good to hear their hitting stoneflies.
after watching video, looks to be high 20's  nice work
